query.statement: UPDATE SAPHEE.ZCST127 AS A SET A.CS127_BSU = #CHB# WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND (A.MANDT, A.CS127_UPN, A.CS127_CST) IN ( SELECT B.MANDT ,B.CS126_UPN ,B.CS126_CST FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 AS B WHERE B.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND B.CS126_PJT = #PJT# AND B.CS126_HNO = #HNO# AND B.CS126_DDT = '' )
